ingredients.ingredient: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded to 1/4 inch thickness

cookingTips: Pound chicken between plastic wrap to avoid mess and splatter
Fill and roll tightly, then secure with toothpicks if needed
Combine melted butter with hot sauce for even distribution while baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user pound thin chicken breasts and roll them with cheese, then bake with a spiced butter-sauce coating for an elegant entrée.
